Weymouth_Town.Braintree Split:
The Braintree Split is the major interchange of Interstate 93 (I-93), U.S. Route 1 (US 1), and Route 3 in the South Shore of Massachusetts, on the city line between Braintree and Quincy. Traveling northbound, the routes merge into a three-way concurrency towards Boston; traveling southbound, they divide into the concurrent I-93 and US 1 towards southeastern Massachusetts and the independent Route 3 towards Cape Cod.
The split was previously the southern terminus of Route 128, the main beltway around Boston; it shared the roadbed with I-93 and US 1 traveling towards the split before they join with Route 3.
